newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary to raise gas, electricity prices.
newsitem.headline: Hungary to raise gas, electricity prices.

text.p: Hungary will raise gas prices an average 11.3 percent and electricity prices by 4.5 percent on July 1, the Ministry of Industry, Trade and Tourism said on Monday.
The ministry said that gas prices for households would rise by 9.9 percent, but it did not disclose the rate at which industrial prices will increase.
The ministry said that both average and household electricity prices would rise by 4.5 percent on July 1.
Hungary revises it gas and electricity prices quarterly according to a price formula incorporating justified production or supply costs.
